titleStmt.title: A treatise of the Holy Trinunity [sic]. In two parts. The first, asserting the deity of Jesus Christ and the Holy Spirit, in the unity of essence with God the father. The second, in defence of the former, containeth answers to the chiefest objections made against this doctrine. By Isaac Marlow.
titleStmt.author: Marlow, Isaac.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
